ResourceFeature.Name: Staff of Healing
ResourceFeature.Text: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier: cure wounds (1 charge per spell level, up to 4th), lesser restoration (2 charges), or mass cure wounds (5 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff vanishes in a flash of light, lost forever.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Staff of Healing
BonusSpellFeature.Text: 1 charge per spell level, up to 4th
